body:
I noticed a lot of packages will have something like this:
```python
if '+mpi' in spec:
    config_args.append('CC={0}'.format(spec['mpi'].mpicc))
```
My question is, if we change `CC` to be something other than Spack's compiler wrapper, does the compiler wrapper still get called? If not, how are things like `-L/path/to/dep`, `-I/path/to/dep`, and RPATH logic for every dependency included in the build?
title: Question about MPI and Spack's compiler wrappers
